title: j) In agricultural zone, uses mentioned at Sr
clause_text: j) In agricultural zone, uses mentioned at Sr.No.A & B of table 7-A, shall be entitled for 100% additional FSI over and above, permissible in said zone.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets
